articles.title: World Cup begins with total embarrassment
articles.description: England and New Zealand opened the Cricket World Cup on Thursday faced with a largely empty stadium - and those in the crowd donned tops and face-paint in the national colours of India.
articles.content:

articles.author: Simnikiwe Xabanisa
articles.title: SABC dodges World Cup blackout bullet (again), this time for the Cricket World Cup
articles.description: For the second time in a month, the SABC's been given a last-minute reprieve from the blackout involving a national team after it and Multichoice agreed to broadcast the Cricket World Cup on Thursday.
articles.content: The SABC has once again narrowly avoided the possibility of a complete blackout of a national team involved in a World Cup, this time the Proteas in cricket's quadrennial showpiece in India. This is … [+2225 chars]

articles.author: Al Jazeera Staff
articles.title: ‘Where’s the crowd?’: Fans deride empty stadium at Cricket World Cup opener
articles.description: Cricket fans slam organisers as the ICC Cricket World Cup gets underway amidst thousands of empty seats in Ahmedabad.
articles.content:
It was billed as the most anticipated cricket event of the year, held in the sports biggest stadium globally, in a country that is known to worship the game.
But when the ICC Cricket World Cup 2023 … [+5848 chars]

articles.author: Philippe Escande
articles.title: Coupe du monde de cricket : « L’affirmation de la nouvelle puissance de l’Inde dans le monde »
articles.description: Pour la quatrième fois, la péninsule indienne accueille la Coupe du monde de cricket.  Les sponsors se sont bousculés pour avancer leurs pions sur l’un des seuls grands pays affichant encore une forte croissance dans le monde.
articles.content:
Le stade Narendra Modi, à Ahmedabad, mercredi 4 octobre 2023. SAM PANTHAKY / AFP

articles.description: Wides, lbw calls, swing - plenty of things were different in white-ball cricket back then | ESPNcricinfo.com
